text: Yesli My okazhem cheloveku milost' posle postigshikh yego nepriyatnostey, on skazhet: "Ushli nepriyatnosti i nikogda bol'she ne proizoydut!" On yeshcho bol'she budet radovat'sya mirskim blagam i yeshcho bol'she voznesotsya nad drugimi, chto pomeshayet yego serdtsu vozblagodarit' svoyego Gospoda dolzhnym obrazom. Eto prisushche bol'shinstvu lyudey. Oni koleblyutsya: ot otchayaniya do gordyni
